titleStmt.title: Here begynneth a lytell treatyse called the wyse chylde of thre yere olde The enfant sage beynge of thre yeres of age demaunded by Adryan emperoure. The whiche hym answered vnto euery thynge he asked.

publicationStmt.publisher: In fletestrete at the sygne of the Sonne by Wynkyn de Worde,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
